title: Winderl
author: Winderl
content: Would you brethren be willing to fill out a short survey for me to help me establish if there would be a market for my idea of creating a crypto course online for the next crypto bull cycle which I expect to peak in 2025, in the link below?  I will not personally be investing in any altcoins like SOL, or APT, or PEPE, that carry an unacceptable amount of risk to help people meet their goals.  Thank you.https://api.leadconnectorhq.com/widget/form/CeEJJjxCmgjoLUmA0R5s

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.created_time: June 03, 2023, 09:39:51 PMLast edit: June 04, 2023, 09:38:41 PM by JeromeTash
comments.body: So I checked out the survey link and I have a question.Why do you need the Full name, phone number/Country and Email address of the person taking the survey? I think this is not necessaryI was going to try out the survey but I can't share out my personal information randomly just like that.

comments.author: Winderl
comments.body: Thank you Jerome,    That's kind of you buddy.  I don't have any way to change the format of the way the surveys are submitted.  I completely understand your concern.  If you want to leave your answers in a reply, I would still highly value your answers.  If you would rather not don't worry about it.  I'm not trying to sell you anything, and thanks for your consideration.

comments.author: SyndicateLabs
comments.body: Do you want to survey or get information from people?Simplify everything through the problem and you can ask any questions here, with the assessment and judgment in the future to 2025, I just want to share about a few streams of information related to the trends. Potential trends are active and likely to accelerate sharply in the future, and most of it is related to areas such as WEB3, AI, social, e-commerce,...

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: Winderl on June 03, 2023, 10:16:17 PMThank you Jerome,    That's kind of you buddy.  I don't have any way to change the format of the way the surveys are submitted.  And what procedures did you take when storing this data. A full name combined with a phone number and e-mail is already data that has value on the darknet. This is data that can be used for scams. This is data that should be properly taken care of or not collected. The mere fact that its not mandatory to fill them does not change the fact that you should not even be able to obtain them, because maybe someone is not aware and will share them. So if your survey allows others to provide sensitive data, you should automatically have appropriate procedures to handle them safely. I recommend google surveys that don't have a fixed format (for me it's doubtful if you actually couldn't edit the format of your poll)

comments.author: Winderl
comments.body: Thank you for expressing your concern Tytanowy.  I don't have anyway to change the surveys.  I am paying just to be able to make the surveys.  I am not a technical person at all, and the service for which I am paying is all connected.  The marketing team will help me bring my idea to market if they are convinced there is a market for it based on my surveys.  The personal information comes directly to me and I am solely responsible for it.  And I have no desire to exploit it.  But I understand it is a barrier to people I don't know.  I even have some friends who are not comfortable filling it out for the same reasons.  And I make no judgement about that.  Do what your conscience tells you that you are comfortable with or not comfortable with.  Just ponder the questions in the survey for your own benefit if you don't want to fill it out.  Thank you my friend.

comments.body: It does not need a questionnaire as no one can give you an accurate answer. The reason for this is that the altcoins market is changing and is rarely itself within two years or at least the current estimates will not be correct during the next two years.The best advice will be to close this topic now and open it after 6 months of halving, specifically in the month of 10/2024, then it will be the possibility that the bitcoin will reach the highest summit during the coming year high and therefore it is easy to choose the appropriate alternative currency.
